short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: whatsender - Browser extension for initiating WhatsApp chats without saving the phone number.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly Start WhatsApp Chats Without Saving Numbers

With this browser extension, you can quickly start WhatsApp chats without the hassle of saving phone numbers. Ideal for those regularly reaching out to new contacts or clients while keeping their contact list clutter-free.

Key Benefits:
✅ Instant Access: Start a WhatsApp chat with any number directly from your browser.
✅ No Need to Save Contacts: Communicate with temporary or one-time contacts without adding them to your phonebook.
✅ Fast and Simple: Enter the phone number and country code, click, and start chatting instantly.
✅ Privacy First: This extension keeps your conversations secure—no data is collected, ensuring chats remain private between you and the contact.

Getting Started:
Visit web.whatsapp.com
Scan the QR code to link your WhatsApp account.
Open the WhatSender Pro extension and enter your recipient's number.
Include the local or international country code for each number!
Whether you’re a business professional managing multiple client inquiries or simply need a quick way to connect with new contacts, this extension is an essential tool for a seamless WhatsApp experience.

Powered by WhatSender Pro
